entry.summary:
Vendor: cascade-preset-2
Type:
Price: 160.00

'Woven Hanger ' is a hand - woven leather and ceramic plant hanger, the result of an exclusive collaboration with Melbourne-based leather craftswoman Kym Lightfoot.

Designed and made in Melbourne from hand-glazed stoneware and hand-woven leather.
Available in two colours; Cloud and Ivory.

entry.title: Terracotta Clay Pot | Various Glazes
entry.summary:
Vendor: cascade-preset-2
Type:
Price: 110.00

Handcrafted in Melbourne, with no two exactly alike, this planter showcases a simple yet striking form and pairs well with all manner of plant life.

Our classic design reimagined with terracotta clay to perfectly complement Ivy Muse plant stands that have a pot hole approx. 190mm in diameter.

For flexibility, a subtle flat base allows the pot to free-stand on flat surfaces.
Designed and made in Melbourne from hand-glazed terracotta clay.
Ivy Muse pots are individually handcrafted, leading to slight variances in shape and colour. Available in Clay Dip and Poppyseed.

entry.title: Stevie Wall Hook
entry.summary:
Vendor: cascade-preset-2
Type:
Price: 95.00

Attaching to the wall, 'Stevie' can team with a variety of hanging planters and can help maximise your wall space for plant-life.

Our Stevie Wall Hook was created for those who love the idea of a hanging plant - but hate the idea of drilling into their ceiling. 'Stevie' can team with a variety of hanging planters and can help you to maximise your wall space for plant-life.

Designed and made in Melbourne from powder-coated steel.
Available in two sizes and in two colours; Black and White.

entry.title: Lumen
entry.summary:
Vendor: cascade-preset-2
Type:
Price: 130.00

Formed from one single piece of glass, ‘Lumen’ is a petite tabletop vessel designed to house small plants, flowers, open-air terrariums and other objects.

Designed in Australia and crafted to the most exacting standards in Europe, Lumen showcases the natural beauty of plants all the while sharing an insight into their intricate growth.

Two colour options available: Shadow and Limited Edition Aubergine.

Lumen arrives fully gift packaged making it the perfect gift for yourself or others.

entry.title: Medium Planter
entry.summary:
Vendor: cascade-preset-2
Type:
Price: 105.00

A collaboration between Ivy Muse and Cisco & The Sun.

With a shared commitment to sustainable production and practices, timeless design and minimalist aesthetic, we are thrilled to launch a custom planter collection in collaboration with sustainable handmade ceramic brand Cisco & the Sun.

The collection is available in three sizes and four colourways, all planters have been designed with a drip tray base, ensuring functioning. Perfect for indoor plants in any space at home.

Tall and eye-catching, our medium-sized planter is ideal for vertical spaces, creating both depth and beauty.
A perfect fit for medium sized plants like Rhipsalis, Hoya and Orchids.

Available in four glazes; Brushed White, Dove Green, Natural Earth  and Dark Ash.

entry.title: Large Planter
entry.summary:
Vendor: cascade-preset-2
Type:
Price: 215.00

With a shared commitment to sustainable production and practices, timeless design and minimalist aesthetic, we are thrilled to launch a custom planter collection in collaboration with sustainable handmade ceramic brand Cisco & the Sun.

The collection is available in three sizes and four colourways, all planters have been designed with a drip tray base, ensuring functionality.

Our large planter is our most dramatic, as beautiful as it is functional. We recommend larger plants like Peace Lily, Devil's ivy baskets, or ZZ plants.

Available in four glazes; Brushed White, Dove Green, Natural Earth  and Dark Ash.

A collaboration between Ivy Muse and Cisco & The Sun.

With a shared commitment to sustainable production and practices, timeless design and minimalist aesthetic, we are thrilled to launch a custom planter collection in collaboration with sustainable handmade ceramic brand Cisco & the Sun.

The collection is available in three sizes and four colourways, all planters have been designed with a drip tray base, ensuring functioning. Perfect for indoor plants in any space at home.

Available in four glazes; Brushed White, Dove Green, Natural Earth  and Dark Ash.
